tool_description: Capitalize titles and headlines according to the title capitalization rules of various style guides.
name: Title Case Converter
title: Title Case Converter

api_list.name: Bulk Title Case
api_list.description: Converts up to 1000 titles to title case. See the About page for more information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://title-case-converter.p.rapidapi.com/v1/BulkTitleCase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "title-case-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
